item.description:
For all types, including 8s, who want to improve their relationships with 8s. Learn effective tips and skills in relating to 8, The Powerhouse. Perfect for anyone in relationship to an 8 partner, boss, friend or relative.

7:30-10pm

Herb Pearce, M.Ed., is a leading expert in the Enneagram and counsels individuals, couples and families to relate effectively to each of the 9 personality styles. He leads workshops and trainings to groups and organizations to understand and respect differences and to work together in productive and satisfying ways. Herb is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living, www.herbstipsforliving.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: Because I want you to have great relationships with 8s and learn how to be effective in your communication.
item.name: Relating to 8s
